text: Where real property has been sold under a written contract executed by the vendor, and there has been such a performance of its terms by the vendee as would entitle him to a decree for a conveyance of the legal title, without condition, the vendor may not recover the property from the vendee.

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Ejectment and Other Real Property Actions. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Performance of contract by vendee as precluding vendor from recovery.
